prime.bindable.collections.BalancingListCollection<T>

type
class
implements
IListCollection<T, BalancingList<T>>
IEditableList<T>
available in
cpp, cs, java, js, neko, php, swf
metadata
:build
'???'
:keep
BalancingListCollection is a collection of a fixed number of lists which act like one list. When an item is added to the collection it will put it in one of the child-lists and it will try to make each list of the same length.

Constructor

new(max : Int)
The position of the list that is currently the longest

Instance Variables

change(default,null) : prime.signals.Signal1<ListChange<T>>

length(accessor,null) : Int

lists(default,null) : ArrayList<BalancingList<T>>

maxLists : Int

Maximum number of lists that will be balanced. TODO: create a setter for this property and rebalance all the lists when this number is changed.

inline move(item : T, newPos : Int, ?curPos : Int) : T

parameters
item
newpos
returns
item
Method will move the given item to it's new position. The process of moving is a bit complexer in a balancingList because the items that follow up on eachother are spread over multiple lists.
